ai-tha-ap164:1.2_0: for the sake of the world’s enjoying the benefit of the world.
ai-tha-ap164:2.1_0: I plunged in the royal compound.
ai-tha-ap164:2.4_0: I saw the benefit of the world,
ai-tha-ap164:3.2_0: shook the stilt longhouse of Migāra’s mother
ai-tha-ap164:4.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap164:4.2_0: As a bird was worshipped by the flowers,
ai-tha-ap164:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap164:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Kalandaka.
ai-tha-ap164:8.1_0: Seeing the second chief of the gods,
